snippet.title: Midnight Murder Club Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
You are formally invited to join the Midnight Murder Club, the most prestigious secret society you’ve never heard of.

Midnight Murder Club is a six-player first person shooter party game with a dark twist. The entire game is played in the pitch blackness of an old Victorian mansion. The only light you’ll ever see will come from you or your opponents.

From Velan Studios, the team behind Knockout City and Hot Wheels: Rift Rally. Coming fall 2024 to Steam PC.

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2698870/Midnight_Murder_Club/
